segments.text: No . Could you tell me something more about it ? I want to play well .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There are 10 frames in a bowling game . Each player is allowed to bowl two balls in each frame .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: ' Round ' and ' frame ' are two different terms .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Perhaps you can tell me a little more about this .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hey , slow down . I'll tell you more while playing .
segments.speaker: S1
